DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the procedural safety and to identify and characterize therapeutic and functional endpoint assessments in subjects with documented critical limb ischemia who received treatment with the Cotavance Paclitaxel-Coated Balloon vs. those who received POBA only.
DOC.brief_title: European Study of POBA Versus Cotavance(R) Paclitaxel Coated Balloon for the Treatment of Infrapopliteal Lesions in Critical Limb Ischemia (EURO CANAL)
DOC.criteria: Subjects with CLI Participation in another research trial Medical conditions the study doctor will assess
